languages.text: "Очередное кощунство, коим уже нет меры". {n}Сухой голос Паскаля лязгает, словно гусеничный трак. Визор вспыхивает ослепительным зеленым, затем синим, и вы слышите металлический стон, идущий отовсюду. Словно сам мануфакторум подвергается пытке.{/n}

"Another blasphemy. They are too many to count now." {n}Pasqal's dry voice is rattling like a heavy vehicle's chain track. His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It is as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Очередное кощунство, коим уже нет меры". {n}Сухой голос Паскаля лязгает, словно гусеничный трак. Визор вспыхивает ослепительным зеленым, затем синим, и вы слышите металлический стон, идущий отовсюду. Словно сам мануфакторум подвергается пытке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Another blasphemy. They are too many to count now." {n}Pasqal's dry voice is rattling like a heavy vehicle's chain track. His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It's as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}

His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It is as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Another blasphemy. They are too many to count now." {n}Pasqal's dry voice is rattling like a heavy vehicle's chain track. His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It is as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “又是亵渎的恶行。这样的恶行实在是太多了，根本记录不完。”{n}帕斯卡干巴巴的声音就像重型车辆的链条一样嘎嘎作响。他的面甲上亮起了耀眼的绿色，随后是蓝光。你听到四面八方传来了金属般的呻吟声，就好像这座制造工厂本身正在遭受折磨一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Another blasphemy. They are too many to count now." {n}Pasqal's dry voice is rattling like a heavy vehicle's chain track. His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It is as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “又是亵渎的恶行。这样的恶行实在是太多了，根本记录不完。”{n}帕斯卡干巴巴的声音就像重型车辆的链条一样嘎嘎作响。他的面甲上亮起了耀眼的绿色，随后是蓝光。你听到四面八方传来了金属般的呻吟声，就好像这座制造工厂本身正在遭受折磨一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ein weiteres Sakrileg. Es sind inzwischen zu viele, um sie noch zu zählen." {n}Pasqals trockene Stimme rattert wie die Kette eines schweren Fahrzeugs. Sein Visor erstrahlt in blendendem Grün, dann Blau, dann hörst du von überall ein metallisches Stöhnen. Es ist, als würde das Manufactorum selbst gefoltert werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Another blasphemy. They are too many to count now." {n}Pasqal's dry voice is rattling like a heavy vehicle's chain track. His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It is as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein weiteres Sakrileg. Es sind inzwischen zu viele, um sie noch zu zählen." {n}Pasqals trockene Stimme rattert wie die Kette eines schweren Fahrzeugs. Sein Visor erstrahlt in blendendem Grün, dann Blau, dann hörst du von überall ein metallisches Stöhnen. Es ist, als würde das Manufactorum selbst gefoltert werden.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Otra blasfemia. Ahora son demasiados para contarlos». {n}La voz sardónica de Pasqal traquetea como las orugas de un vehículo pesado. Su visor se ilumina con una cegadora luz verde, luego se torna azul, y oyes un quejido metálico que procede de todas partes. Es como si el propio manufactorum estuviese siendo torturado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Another blasphemy. They are too many to count now." {n}Pasqal's dry voice is rattling like a heavy vehicle's chain track. His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It is as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Otra blasfemia. Ahora son demasiados para contarlos». {n}La voz sardónica de Pasqal traquetea como las orugas de un vehículo pesado. Su visor se ilumina con una cegadora luz verde, luego se torna azul, y oyes un quejido metálico que procede de todas partes. Es como si el propio manufactorum estuviese siendo torturado.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Encore un blasphème. J'ai fini par perdre le compte. » {n}La voix sèche de Pasqal vibre comme les chaînes d'un véhicule lourd. Sa visière s'illumine d'un vert aveuglant, puis en bleu, et un gémissement métallique retentit tout autour de vous. On pourrait croire que le manufactorum lui-même subit les pires tortures.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Another blasphemy. They are too many to count now." {n}Pasqal's dry voice is rattling like a heavy vehicle's chain track. His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It is as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Encore un blasphème. J'ai fini par perdre le compte. » {n}La voix sèche de Pasqal vibre comme les chaînes d'un véhicule lourd. Sa visière s'illumine d'un vert aveuglant, puis en bleu, et un gémissement métallique retentit tout autour de vous. On pourrait croire que le manufactorum lui-même subit les pires tortures.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「また冒涜だ。もう数え切れないほどだ」{n}パスカルの乾いた声は、大型車のチェーンのようにガラガラ鳴っている。彼のバイザーがまばゆい緑、そして青に光り、あちこちから金属的なうめき声が聞こえてくる。まるで聖工場そのものが拷問を受けているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Another blasphemy. They are too many to count now." {n}Pasqal's dry voice is rattling like a heavy vehicle's chain track. His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It is as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「また冒涜だ。もう数え切れないほどだ」{n}パスカルの乾いた声は、大型車のチェーンのようにガラガラ鳴っている。彼のバイザーがまばゆい緑、そして青に光り、あちこちから金属的なうめき声が聞こえてくる。まるで聖工場そのものが拷問を受けているかのようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bir dine aykırılık daha. Bunların ardı arkası kesilmiyor." {n}Pasqal'ın ruhsuz sesi, ağır bir aracın zincirleri misali çıngırdıyor. Vizörü, kör edici yeşil bir ekran gibi aydınlanıp sonrasında maviye dönüyor. Her yanından metalik bir inilti yükseliyor. Sanki bizzat manufaktoruma işkence ediliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Another blasphemy. They are too many to count now." {n}Pasqal's dry voice is rattling like a heavy vehicle's chain track. His visor lights up a blinding green, then blue, and you hear a metallic moan coming from everywhere. It is as though the manufactorum itself is being tortured.{/n}
